subject: Order #SSN1553 shipping delay?
description_text:
Dear Simsonn support,

I placed an order (#SSN1553) for haptic feedback rumble motor, control box
and power supply on the 28th of May, and I've yet to receive any shipping
updates or confirmation. I find it unusual that an online order would take
more than around two weeks to ship. Can you please advise when I can expect
the order to ship/arrive?

best,
Cristian


 Cristian Sanz-Laria

 Title 24 Energy Consultant

 (818) 438-0671

conversations.body_text: 你好，Cristian Sanz，  由于 VAM Pro 外壳表面处理延迟，原定于 6 月 10 日发货的 VAM Pro 外壳已推迟至预计 6 月 16 日至 18 日之间。对于由此造成的不便，我们深表歉意。我们正在积极联系外壳供应商，以便按照修改后的时间表加快发货速度。由于采用国际快递，预计运输时间会相对较快。感谢您的理解。

Hi,
It's now June 19th and I have received no shipping updates. Do you have a
new estimate for shipping?


 Cristian Sanz-Laria

 Title 24 Energy Consultant

 (818) 438-0671



On Sun, Jun 8, 2025 at 11:52 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Cristian Sanz,  Yes, your order was shipped yesterday, but due to the cumbersome customs clearance now, they may take around the 28th to arrive .
